limit.description: Byte limit the size to the wasm file: size <= limit, wasm bundled into js ,or builded into output.wasm

optimizeLevel.description: How much to focus on optimizing code. [0-3]

shrinkLevel.description: How much to focus on shrinking code size. [0-2, s=1, z=2]

validate.description: Validates the module using Binaryen. Exits if invalid.

debug.description: Enables debug information in emitted binaries.

noAssert.description: Replaces assertions with just their value without trapping.

noEmit.description: Performs compilation as usual but does not emit code.

importMemory.description: Imports the memory instance provided by the embedder.

memoryBase.description: Sets the start offset of compiler-generated static memory.

importTable.description: Imports the function table instance provided by the embedder.

noLib.description: Does not include the shipped standard library.

transform.description: Specifies the path to a custom transform to 'require'.

measure.description: Prints measuring information on I/O and compile times.
